name: Pacific Car Race
description:
Pacific Car Race is a narrative car racing video game that travels through paradisiacal landscapes to the rhythm of urban music. 

The race is organized by Mr. O'Conner, a legendary nomad tycoon, who organizes parties and car races in paradisiacal locations, which summon a diverse universe of speed-loving characters. 

It is led by a mixed and multicultural team of high performance drivers, with valuable needs and motivations to win and fulfill their dreams, demonstrating their talent in racing with the most dangerous tracks that run along the border of the Pacific Ocean. 

Characters Paul: 30 years old, French, electronic music dj Sonia: 26, chilean, hacker, mechanical gamers Pablo: 22 Chilean, Trap graffiti artist Celeste: 24 Brazilian, model
